Index.title: Planeswalker's Portfolio

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Greetings, fellow Planeswalker! I'm a seasoned developer with a passion for crafting magical digital experiences. My skills span across multiple planes of web development, from frontend sorcery to backend wizardry.

nopBuk.title: Nop Buk
nopBuk.description:
A human resources management app inspired by buk. 
 The views are developed with React and the connection to the database and user management with Appwrite. 
 The Backend functionalities are not finished yet, I will develop them little by little.

tic-tac-toe.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
tic-tac-toe.description: A tic-tac-toe game as a review of react hooks.

veelo_tu.title: Veelo Tú
veelo_tu.description: A documentation website that compiles information from various software integrations.

sparkle_buttons.title: Sparkle Buttons
sparkle_buttons.description: An online tool for creating animated buttons in React. Useful for call-to-action, subscriptions and that kind of buttons. In two words: pleasant buttons!

integrationsAsistant.title: Integrations Assistant (BUK)
integrationsAsistant.description: Code generator developed with Ruby integrated into a virtual assistant created on the OpenAI platform. The assistant is customized with a specific knowledge base, can call functions, and generate a .rb file from instructions in an Excel file.

crypto_tracker.title: Crypto Tracker
crypto_tracker.description: A simple crypto tracker to see the price of the main cryptocurrencies and a list with the other ones to have in the radar.

task-generator.title: do not develop my app
task-generator.description: a little bit weird application that wait for a user's prompt as almost all other AI apps do, in this case is to start developing an app, so it will generate a enhanced prompt, a srs, and then, after a little bit of time, it will generate a TREE of tasks. the user can interact with each task using ai features also.

footer.copyright: © 2024 Felipe's Portfolio. All rights reserved across the multiverse.
